What is up with all the password torrents, dude?  On most trackers that isn't allowed.  It's not a huge deal with me and all, but I have to look up the torrent to find the password sometimes.  Kinda annoying.  You could just write a script to unrar (w/ pass) and rar back up without a password, or if you are doing the 'raring', you could ditch the password option.

Just a suggestion.

Anyway, thanks for the game!
